sentences.en: "I've come to reclaim my property," she announced to the desk clerk.
sentences.cn: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentences.en: Bob and Rita the airport, waiting to reclaim their baggage.
sentences.cn: 鲍伯和丽塔在机场等著领回他们的行李.

sentences.en: Football, and Aston Villa will reclaim their lead at the top of the English First Division.
sentences.cn: 来看足球，阿斯顿维拉队将在英格兰甲级联赛重登榜首。

sentences.en: He had no right to take your book away; so reclaim it.
sentences.cn: 他无权拿走你的书, 因此,把书要回来.

sentences.en: He has invented a new method to reclaim valuable raw materials from industrial waste water.
sentences.cn: 他发明了一种从工业废水中回收有价值原料的新方法.

sentences.en: I have tried to reclaim my money without success.
If you make regular gifts through a covenant we can reclaim the income tax which you have already paid on this money.
sentences.cn: 如果你签订契约定期捐赠，那么我们可以要求返还你这笔钱上交的所得税。

sentences.en: It is incumbent on me to reclaim him.
sentences.cn: 劝他改过是我义不容辞的义务.

sentences.en: My body was on autopilot as I trailed through passport control, baggage reclaim and customs.
sentences.cn: 我机械性地跟着通过了过境检查、行李认领和海关。

sentences.en: Only now can mountaineers reclaim the upper reaches.
sentences.cn: 仅在此时,山行者们才能攀向山峰的更高处.

sentences.en: They would have blown his brain to pieces before they could reclaim it.
sentences.cn: 他们来不及改造就把他的脑袋打得粉碎.

sentences.en: This land will be reclaimed for a new airport.
sentences.cn: 这块土地将被开发用来建新机场。

sentences.en: Vast is the power of cities to reclaim the wanderer.
sentences.cn: 城市对迷途人感召力量是巨大的.

sentences.en: What I've tried very subtly to do is to reclaim language.
sentences.cn: 我费尽心机在做的就是改造、拯救语言。

sentences.en: You can reclaim old boards and use them as shelves.
sentences.cn: 旧木板可以废物利用，当搁板。

sentences.en: You may be entitled to reclaim some tax.
sentences.cn: 你也许可以享受一定额度的退税。

sentences.en: You must present this ticket when you reclaim your luggage.
sentences.cn: 当你要取回行李时,必须出示这张票子.

sentences.en: You'll have to go to the police station to reclaim your wallet.
sentences.cn: 你得到警察局去认领你的钱包。

words.tran_cn: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改

trans.tran_cn: 回收； 开垦， 改造； 要回， 挽回； 改正， 悔改
trans.tran_en: to get back an amount of money that you have paid

trans.tran_cn: 开拓；回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改
trans.tran_en: to get back an amount of money that you have paid

trans.tran_cn: 开拓，开垦，感化，取回，沙化，回收再利用；改造某人，使某人悔改
trans.tran_en: to get back an amount of money that you have paid
